This works great- If you want to mirror your complete desktop or your web browser to your TV wirelessly- If you dont have a SMART TVPROS- Browser mirroring is best in class considering this price- Slight lag in Desktop Mirroing as it is still in Beta version.- Android phones can be completely mirrored- Very Simple setup, integrates very well- Audio sync is perfect- InexpensiveCons- Doesn't have a great list of supported apps, hopefully Google would add more in the future.- IOS apps are limitedOverall a worth-full stick, user friendly interface
author: Srinivas aathiyan

review: First off, I don't write many reviews unless I think it's warranted.  I also don't just arbitrarily run products In the mud unless I've had some experience with them.  I can't give this one star because when it works it works well.  However, it (or maybe just mine) decides, on any given day, when it's actually going to show up on the network.  No, it's not a range issue.  Router and chromecast are in the same room.  Not a speed issue, I'm drawing 15-30 Mbps.The only solve is to reset the damn thing which really takes the convenience out of it.  And even then it's hit or miss.I have had the thing a little over two years, and it's really been more of a pain than not.I can't recommend it in good conscience.  Sadly for Google, I am also in an industry where this could be used in any given solution that I engineer... I steer my clients elsewhere.
